channel.title: Personal on Matthew Bunge
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Matthew Bunge

item.title: Personal: I'm Back (Again)
item.description: Well, it’s been a while (again). I could give a long, winding story about why this site went dark for 30’ish months (again), but instead I’ll just take the opportunity to inform everyone that I’ve no longer been working at Tesla since May 2024. I loved the team I was on and it was a lot of fun. Ok joke about the previous post on this site aside, I am legitimately currently looking for new opportunities.

item.title: Personal: I'm Back
item.description: Well, it’s been a while. I could give a long, winding story about why this site went dark for 18’ish months, but instead I’ll just take the opportunity to inform everyone that I’ve been working at Tesla since March 2021. I love the team I’m on and it’s been a lot of fun. There are also a lot of things they don’t want me talking about so that’s the last I’m going to say on that topic, for the time being.
